entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
